public voidReflectionProperty::setValue objectobject mixedvalue
public voidReflectionProperty::setValue mixedvalue
Sets (changes) the property's value.
As of PHP 8.3.0, calling this method with a single argument is deprecated, use ReflectionClass::setStaticPropertyValue instead.

&reftitle.parameters;
object
If the property is non-static an object must be provided to change the property on. If the property is static a value of &null; must be to be provided.
value
The new value.
